title: Order Brella Replica
paragraphs: The Order Brella Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is a reskin of the Splat Brella, and a direct successor to the Splatoon 2 Hero Brella Replica.
The Order Brella Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Splat Brella, containing only white and gray colors.
The Order Brella Replica comes with Sprinkler and Triple Inkstrike. The Order Brella Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Splat Brella.
To unlock the Order Brella Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Marina's Palette.
